com.sylconnexity.spring18.controller

Class DBLinkController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sylconnexity.spring18.controller.DBLinkController

  • @Controller
 @RequestMapping(path="/links")
public class DBLinkController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for the Link class, the API of which is available at /links.

    • Method Detail

      • getLinks

        @Cacheable(value="Links")
 @GetMapping(path="")
 @ResponseBody
public java.lang.Iterable<Link> getLinks(@RequestParam(value="publisherID",defaultValue="-1")
                                                                                                           java.lang.Long publisherID,
                                                                                                           @RequestParam(value="merchantID",defaultValue="-1")
                                                                                                           java.lang.Long merchantID)
        Get the Links with the associated publisherID or merchantID if provided.
        Parameters:
        publisherID - The ID of an associated publisher
        merchantID - The ID of an associated merchant
        Returns:
        A list of links, filtered by the given IDs if provided

      • getLinkByID

        @Cacheable(value="Link")
 @GetMapping(path="/{id}")
 @ResponseBody
public Link getLinkByID(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                                              java.lang.Long linkID)
        Gets the Link with the given ID if it exists.
        Parameters:
        linkID - The ID of a link
        Returns:
        The link with the given ID or null if it does not exist

      • saveLink

        @CacheEvict(cacheNames={"Link","Links"},
            allEntries=true)
 @PostMapping(path="")
 @ResponseBody
public Link saveLink(@RequestParam(value="publisherID")
                                                                                                                                     java.lang.Long publisherID,
                                                                                                                                     @RequestParam(value="merchantID")
                                                                                                                                     java.lang.Long merchantID,
                                                                                                                                     @RequestParam(value="earnings")
                                                                                                                                     java.lang.Double earnings,
                                                                                                                                     @RequestParam(value="customTitle",defaultValue="New Link")
                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String customTitle,
                                                                                                                                     @RequestParam(value="originalURL")
                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String originalURL,
                                                                                                                                     @RequestParam(value="imageRedirectPermahashLink")
                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String imageRedirectPermahashLink)
        Creates a new Link with the given information.
        Parameters:
        publisherID - Identifier for an individual influencer
        merchantID - The merchant identifier for where the SYL Link landed
        earnings - Amount of money the influencer has earned from a SYL Link
        customTitle - The title associated with the SYL Link that the user provided
        originalURL - The original URL associated with the SYL Link that the user provided
        imageRedirectPermahashLink - The unique hash code associated with a SYL Link
        Returns:
        The newly created Link

      • saveLinkByID

        @CachePut(cacheNames="Link",
          key="#linkID")
 @CacheEvict(cacheNames="Links",
            allEntries=true)
 @PostMapping(path="/{id}")
 @ResponseBody
public Link saveLinkByID(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                                                                                                                                              java.lang.Long linkID,
                                                                                                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="earnings",defaultValue="-1.0")
                                                                                                                                                                                              java.lang.Double earnings,
                                                                                                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="customTitle",defaultValue="")
                                                                                                                                                                                              java.lang.String customTitle)
        Updates the Link with the given ID if it exists with the provided information.
        Parameters:
        linkID - The ID of a Link
        earnings - The new earnings of the link
        customTitle - The new title of the link
        Returns:
        The updated Link, or null if the original ID did not exist

      • deleteLink

        @CacheEvict(cacheNames={"Click","Clicks","Link","Links"},
            allEntries=true)
 @DeleteMapping(path="/{id}")
 @ResponseBody
public void deleteLink(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                                                                                                               java.lang.Long linkID)
        Deletes the Link with the given ID and its associated clicks.
        Parameters:
        linkID - The ID of a Link
